mobile_desc: We build and maintain mobile networks including mobile phones and wireless communications. We also provide technical support for communication area optimization and stable operation.
mobile_desc2: We flexibly respond to the evolving communication environment and support comfortable mobile communications.
optimization_desc: We provide technical support for communication area optimization and stable operation.

network_desc: We design, construct, and maintain server, router, switch, optical transmission, and switching equipment necessary for communication carrier networks. We provide comprehensive support including equipment configuration and activation testing.
network_desc2: We perform construction work for optical fiber networks connecting data centers and base stations.
system_development_desc: We develop custom systems aimed at improving operational efficiency and business processes. We can provide comprehensive support from requirements definition to design, development, and maintenance. We handle various fields including web systems and business applications.
infrastructure_construction_desc: We design and construct IT infrastructure such as servers and networks. We propose optimal infrastructure considering security and availability. We can flexibly handle projects from small to large scale.
network_camera_desc: We install network cameras for security and surveillance purposes, providing a safe and secure environment. We provide comprehensive support from installation location surveys to wiring work and configuration. Remote monitoring and integration with recording systems are also possible.
access_control_system_desc: We introduce access control systems for offices and facilities to support security enhancement. We support various authentication methods including IC cards and facial recognition. We provide one-stop service from installation to operational support.
lan_electrical_work_desc: We perform LAN wiring work and network construction for offices and factories. We also handle low-voltage electrical work including telephones, intercoms, and disaster prevention equipment. We support the development of stable communication environments.
staffing_desc: We respond to temporary staffing needs through flexible staffing services. We accommodate various contract forms from short-term to long-term, providing personnel with the necessary skills when needed. We increase workforce mobility and improve operational efficiency. We have particular strength in specialized fields such as IT and communications.
recruitment_desc: We introduce excellent personnel necessary for corporate growth. We carefully select the best personnel suited to each company's needs and culture, supporting efficient hiring processes. By providing ready-to-work personnel, we support business problem-solving and growth.
recruitment_desc2: We also support recruitment services for foreign engineers, introduction of technical skilled personnel, and recruitment services for IT-selected new graduates.
bpo_services_desc: Through BPO services that outsource part of operations, we help reduce corporate operating costs and provide an environment where companies can focus on core business.
bpo_services_desc2: We handle a wide range of operations from back-office work to customer support, supporting improved corporate competitiveness.
event_production_desc: We hold diverse live performances daily, from young comedians to established professionals. The appeal is the intimate space where customers and performers are close.
event_production_desc2: It's a theater that can be enjoyed by comedy fans as well as first-time visitors.

security_policy_purpose_desc: This Information Security Basic Policy (hereinafter referred to as 'this Basic Policy') sets forth the basic policy regarding information security of MINERVA Corporation (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company'). This Basic Policy aims to protect information assets including personal information of the Company and our customers and business partners that we handle.
security_policy_scope_desc: The scope of this Basic Policy covers all information assets used by the Company in its business and equipment to protect such information assets, as well as all employees of the Company including officers, employees, contract employees, part-time employees, and employees of cooperating companies (hereinafter referred to as 'all employees').
security_policy_item1: Management Responsibility: The Company will make organizational and continuous efforts to improve and enhance information security under management leadership.
security_policy_item2: Establishment of Internal System: The Company will establish a contact point for information security to accurately understand the information security situation at the company-wide level and promptly implement necessary measures.
security_policy_item3: Implementation of Information System and Security Measures: The Company will conduct risk analysis and implement security measures for information systems such as unauthorized access countermeasures, virus countermeasures, leakage countermeasures, and reliability countermeasures to protect the Company's information system assets. In addition, we will regularly provide education and training on information security to all employees and raise awareness of the importance of information security, proper handling, and management.
security_policy_item4: Compliance with Laws and Contractual Requirements: The Company will comply with regulations, norms, contracts with customers, and related laws and regulations regarding information security.
security_policy_item5: Response to Information Security Violations and Incidents: In the event of an information security incident, the Company will promptly report to management and related parties and take emergency measures as necessary. We will analyze the cause of such information security incidents and take measures to prevent recurrence. In addition, if an employee violates the information security policy, it will be subject to disciplinary procedures.
security_policy_date: September 1, 2025 MINERVA Corporation President and CEO Eiji Odagiri
privacy_policy_management_desc: We will keep our customers' personal information accurate and up-to-date, and to prevent unauthorized access, loss, damage, alteration, leakage, etc. of personal information, we will take necessary measures such as maintaining security systems, improving management systems, and thoroughly educating employees, implement security measures, and strictly manage personal information.
privacy_policy_usage: Purpose of Use of Personal Information
privacy_policy_usage_desc: Personal information received from customers will be used to send emails and materials as responses to inquiries, business guidance, and questions from the Company.
privacy_policy_disclosure: Prohibition of Disclosure and Provision to Third Parties
privacy_policy_disclosure_desc: We will appropriately manage personal information received from customers and will not disclose personal information to third parties except in the following cases:
privacy_policy_disclosure_item2: When disclosing to contractors to whom the Company outsources business in order to perform services requested by the customer
privacy_policy_disclosure_item3: When disclosure is required by law
privacy_policy_security_desc: We take thorough security measures to ensure the accuracy and safety of personal information.
privacy_policy_inquiry_desc: If a customer wishes to inquire, correct, or delete their personal information, we will respond after confirming that they are the person in question.
privacy_policy_compliance: Compliance with Laws, Norms, and Review
privacy_policy_compliance_desc: We will comply with Japanese laws and other norms applicable to the personal information we hold, and will regularly review the content of this policy and strive to improve it.
privacy_policy_contact_desc: For inquiries regarding the Company's handling of personal information, please contact us at: MINERVA Corporation, 〒155-0031 2-7-14-202 Kitazawa, Setagaya-ku, Tokyo, TEL: 03-5738-7123, FAX: 03-5738-7674
environmental_policy_basic_desc: MINERVA Corporation (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') recognizes that Earth's resources are finite and will continue to act with lasting consideration for environmental conservation as one of its important challenges.
environmental_policy_policy_desc1: The Company provides various services including personnel dispatch, business consignment, and services related to customer systems, and also uses many OA equipment such as vehicles and PCs within the company. In all aspects of these businesses, we will establish, implement, maintain, and continuously improve an environmental management system with the following policy, taking into consideration the conservation of the global environment.
environmental_policy_policy_desc2: We will conduct environmental education for all employees and workers of this group, and through the participation of all group members, we will strive for environmental conservation and pollution prevention. We will comply with environmental laws, ordinances, and other requirements. In the Company's activities, we will promote the following items to reduce environmental impact:
environmental_policy_item_a: Effective use of paper resources considering information leakage
environmental_policy_item_b: Effective use of energy resources such as electricity, gas, and petroleum resources
environmental_policy_item_c: Reduction of waste and promotion of recycling
environmental_policy_policy_desc3: We will regularly review this environmental policy and objectives and make revisions as necessary.
environmental_policy_policy_desc4: This environmental policy will be communicated to all employees and workers and will be actively disclosed to the public.
